item.title: 无论谁在美国大选中获胜，比特币期权交易商的目标都是 80,000 美元
item.description: 期权交易商正在加大押注，认为无论谁赢得美国总统大选，比特币都将在 11 月底达到 80,000 美元的历史新高。【原文：Options traders are increasing bets that Bitcoin will reach a record high of $80,000 by the end of November no matter who wins the US presidential election.】

item.title: 穆迪上调盈利预期，债券狂潮推动评级业务发展
item.description: 穆迪公司（Moody's Corp. ）公布的第三季度财报显示，该公司的盈利超出预期，并上调了其年度展望，此前的一系列债券交易促进了该公司的评级业务。【原文：Moody’s Corp.’s reported third-quarter earnings that beat estimates and raised its annual outlook after a flurry of bond deals boosted its ratings business.】

item.title: GAIL 印度公司目标在年底前达成新的长期液化天然气供应协议
item.description: 印度最大的天然气管道公用事业公司 GAIL India Ltd. 计划通过谈判达成一项新的长期液化天然气协议，以满足日益增长的需求。【原文：GAIL India Ltd., the nation’s largest gas-pipeline utility, plans to negotiate a new long-term liquefied natural gas deal to meet rising demand.】

item.title: SAP将就司法部调查审查合作伙伴Carahsoft
item.description: 欧洲最有价值的软件公司 SAP SE 正在仔细审查其与政府转售商 Carahsoft Technology Corp. 的关系，此前联邦调查局于 9 月份突袭了该公司在美国弗吉尼亚州的办事处。【原文：SAP SE, Europe’s most valuable software company, is scrutinizing its relationship with government reseller Carahsoft Technology Corp. after the FBI raided the US company’s Virginia office in September.】

item.title: 加拿大央行有能力加速降息：决策指南
item.description: 加拿大央行可能会大幅降息，承认随着通胀减弱和经济增长停滞，借贷成本应更快下降。【原文：The Bank of Canada is likely to make a jumbo cut to interest rates, acknowledging that borrowing costs should fall more quickly as inflation wanes and economic growth stagnates.】

item.description: 全球最大的资产管理公司之一太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Pacific Investment Management Co., one of the world’s largest asset managers, says investors have misplayed emerging markets by focusing too heavily on risky bonds.】

item.title: 森特诺表示，如果数据表明欧洲央行将加快减息步伐
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马里奥-森特诺（Mario Centeno）表示，如果数据表明需要加快货币宽松政策的步伐，欧洲中央银行将随时准备考虑这样做。【原文：The European Central Bank would be ready consider accelerating its pace of monetary easing should the data suggest such a move, according to Governing Council member Mario Centeno.】

item.title: 自由港因火灾请求印尼延长铜出口期限
item.description: 自由港麦克莫兰公司（Freeport-McMoRan Inc.【原文：Freeport-McMoRan Inc. is in talks with the Indonesian government to extend its licenses to export copper concentrate because a fire has disrupted the company’s smelter operations in the Southeast Asian nation.】

item.title: 土耳其大亨有意转让港口股权以获得 10 亿美元贷款
item.description: 土耳其大亨费里特-萨亨克（Ferit Sahenk）的 Dogus 控股公司（Dogus Holding AS）正在进行谈判，有可能将其在伊斯坦布尔一家港口和购物中心公司的部分股份转让给贷款人，以偿还一笔 10.2 亿欧元（11 亿美元）的未偿贷款。【原文：Turkish tycoon Ferit Sahenk’s Dogus Holding AS is in talks to potentially transfer part of his stake in an Istanbul port and shopping mall company to lenders over a €1.02 billion ($1.1 billion) unpaid loan.】

item.title: StanChart 调整印度战略，瞄准富裕阶层
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）正在更新其吸引印度富裕客户的战略，向小城镇扩张，并将客户关系经理的人数增加近三分之一。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc is refreshing its strategy to attract rich customers in India, expanding into smaller towns and boosting the number of relationship managers by almost a third.】

item.title: 中国智囊团呼吁为稳定市场投入 2810 亿美元
item.description: 一家与政府有关联的顶级智库称，中国应发行 2 万亿元（2810 亿美元）特别国债，以帮助建立市场稳定基金。【原文：China should issue 2 trillion yuan ($281 billion) of special government bonds to help create a market stabilization fund, according to a top government-linked think tank.】

item.title: 纳格尔否认美联储式 "点阵图 "是欧洲央行利率信号选择
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，欧洲央行并不适合采用美联储的方式来表明借贷成本的未来走势，而应寻找其他方法来改善沟通。【原文：The European Central Bank isn’t well suited for the Federal Reserve’s approach to signaling the future path of borrowing costs and should find other ways to improve its communication instead, Governing Council member Joachim Nagel said.】

item.title: 匈牙利中央银行认为通胀面临更多上行风险
item.description: 匈牙利央行认为，能源价格上涨和新兴市场风险溢价导致通胀风险上升。【原文：Hungary’s central bank sees elevated risks to inflation due to higher energy prices and emerging-market risk premia.】

item.title: 纽结警告：如果对金融监管的关注减少，"经济将自由落体
item.description: 世界上最强大的金融监管机构主席警告政治家们，如果他们将其他公共政策领域置于保护金融体系之上，他们可能会把大部分时间花在 "为处于自由落体状态的经济制定救援计划 "上。【原文：The chair of the world’s most powerful financial regulator has warned politicians that they could spend most of their time “drawing up rescue plans for an economy in free fall” if they prioritize other public policy areas over safeguarding the financial system.】

item.title: 凯雷退出蒂森克虏伯海事部门竞标
item.description: 私募股权公司凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Private equity firm Carlyle Group Inc. has dropped out of a process to acquire Thyssenkrupp AG’s naval shipbuilding unit.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）下调全球经济增长预测，警告风险加剧
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）下调了明年的全球经济增长预期，并警告说，从战争到贸易保护主义的风险正在加速，尽管该组织称赞各国央行在控制通胀的同时没有使国家陷入衰退。【原文：The International Monetary Fund lowered its global growth forecast for next year and warned of accelerating risks from wars to trade protectionism, even as it credited central banks for taming inflation without sending nations into recession.】

item.title: 埃尼即将实施 20 亿欧元计划重塑意大利化工业务
item.description: 埃尼集团（Eni SpA）将斥资约 20 亿欧元（22 亿美元）对其老化的意大利化学品业务进行全面改造，从化石燃料为基础的源产品转向更多使用脱碳产品。【原文：Eni SpA is set to spend about €2 billion ($2.2 billion) to overhaul its aging Italy chemicals business, with a shift away from fossil fuel-based source products toward increasing use of decarbonized options.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德支持的 LCM 为私募债务基金募集 60 亿欧元资金
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）部分控股的另类资产管理公司 LCM Partners Ltd. 正在为一个新基金筹集 60 亿欧元（65 亿美元）资金，该基金将部分投资于不良贷款。【原文：LCM Partners Ltd., an alternative asset manager partly owned by Brookfield Asset Management, is raising €6 billion ($6.5 billion) for a new fund that will partly invest in non-performing loans.】

item.title: 美国将 25% 半导体税收抵免扩展至芯片和太阳能晶片
item.description: 拜登政府最终确定了为半导体制造项目提供 25% 税收减免的规则，扩大了 2022 年《芯片与科学法案》中可能最大的激励项目的资格。【原文：The Biden administration finalized rules for a 25% tax credit for semiconductor manufacturing projects, expanding eligibility for what is likely to be the largest incentive program from the 2022 Chips and Science Act.】

item.title: 氨纶制造商莱卡寻求私人交易进行债务再融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，纺织公司莱卡公司（Lycra Co.【原文：Textile company Lycra Co. is sounding out investors on a private deal that would help it refinance the most senior part of its debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 财政部长称赞比亚考虑以债务换自然
item.description: 赞比亚财政部长西图姆贝科-穆索科特瓦内（Situmbeko Musokotwane）表示，赞比亚正在考虑债转股，以继续减少其海外债务。【原文：Zambia is considering a debt-for-nature swap to keep reducing its overseas obligations, according to Finance Minister Situmbeko Musokotwane.】

item.title: 氧化铝市场恐慌加剧，价格飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 在最大矿产国几内亚发生出口中断并波及中国之后，生产铝所需的关键原材料正飙升至创纪录的高位，因为买家竞相确保供应。【原文：The key raw material needed to make aluminum is tearing toward a record high as buyers race to secure supplies, following an export disruption in top-miner Guinea that has rippled through to China.】

item.title: 象牙海岸收成增加，可可期货延续跌势
item.description: 可可期货跌至近两周来的最低点，因为向象牙海岸港口交付的可可豆数量增加，缓解了供应紧张的局面。【原文：Cocoa futures fell to the lowest in almost two weeks as a pickup in deliveries of beans to ports in Ivory Coast helped ease tight supply.】

item.title: 墨西哥湾石油钻探商出人意料地赢得美国法院缓刑令
item.description:
法官要求联邦政府再用六个月的时间完成生物分析，该分析是在该地区开展行动的基础。【原文：

item.title: 奥地利总统要求亚军保守党组阁
item.description: 奥地利总统要求执政保守党开始与社会民主党进行联合谈判，在未能找到潜在合作伙伴后，总统冷落了最受欢迎的极右翼自由党。【原文：Austria’s president asked the ruling conservative party to start coalition negotiation with the Social Democrats, snubbing the most popular far-right Freedom Party after it failed to find a potential partner.】

item.title: 英国水务公司将获准增加数十亿美元投资
item.description: 英国水务监督机构将允许公司在未来五年内增加多达 70 亿英镑（91 亿美元）的投资，以遏制污水泄漏并改善饮用水质量，此举将要求进一步提高消费者的账单。【原文：The UK’s water watchdog will allow companies to invest as much as £7 billion ($9.1 billion) more in the next five years to curb sewage spills and improve drinking water quality, a move that will require further raising bills for consumers.】

item.title: 日本最大电子展失去消费者魅力
item.description: 日本曾经是世界上最大的电子产品品牌的发源地，如今它正在接受自己在技术领域的新角色。但首先...【原文：Japan, home to what once were the world’s biggest electronics brands, is embracing its new sidekick role in technology. But first...】

item.title: Verizon 通过捆绑服务增加更多移动和宽带用户
item.description: 威瑞森通信公司（Verizon Communications Inc. ）第三季度新增移动电话用户超过分析师预期，并提前实现了宽带用户目标，这表明该公司将流媒体服务和家庭互联网与无线网络捆绑在一起的努力正在取得成效。【原文：Verizon Communications Inc. added more mobile phone subscribers in the third quarter than analysts expected and hit an early target for broadband customers, suggesting its efforts to bundle streaming services and home internet with wireless are paying off.】

item.title: 崛起的贷款人被控隐瞒费用，留下诉讼痕迹
item.description: 罗德尼-威廉姆斯（Rodney Williams）和特拉维斯-霍洛威（Travis Holoway）于 2018 年共同创立了点对点借贷平台 SoLo Funds Inc.SoLo Funds 是风险投资领域为数不多的黑人创办的初创公司之一（2023 年，黑人获得的风险投资仅占全部风险投资的 0.48%），其定位是为那些在紧急情况下发现自己资金短缺的人提供贷款解决方案。【原文：Rodney Williams and Travis Holoway co-founded peer-to-peer lending platform SoLo Funds Inc. in 2018 with a commitment to help the millions of Americans targeted by abusive lenders. One of the few Black-founded startups in venture capital – a demographic that secured only 0.48% of all venture dollars in 2023 – SoLo Funds positioned itself to be a lending solution for those who find themselves cash-strapped in emergency situations.】
